rules_text: [i]Heroic[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell that targets Mira and Kalisti of Akros, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. [i](The copy isn’t cast. A copy of an Aura spell becomes a token.)[/i]
notes:

Mirea and Zemodine
